channel.title: Sweet Bobby: My Catfish Nightmare on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Sweet Bobby: My Catfish Nightmare
item.description: Even seasoned true-crime documentary aficionados will be left perplexed and very, very uncomfortable by what unfolds in this recently released watch on Netflix. A large part of that has to do with the fact that Sweet Bobby: My Catfish Nightmare feels both relatable and ridiculous at the same time and brings to the fore the dark abyss that is the Internet as well as exposes the shocking depths that human apathy can plunge to.
